item.description:
Let's try for Barkplace in the Breakheart Reservation this Saturday (July 25); weather is still up in the air (so to speak), so rain date will be Sunday (July 26); please check your email if it's looking particularly wet out.

Use the link to this meetup for directions or email me for questions.

Hope to see you all there!

adam
item.how_to_find_us: follow the path from the parking lot to the fenced enclosure

group.name: Shiba Inu Meet Up of Eastern MA & Southern NH

item.name: Barkplace meetup in Suagus
